about_the_game:
The Brothers Hotel - Store Description

Welcome to The Brothers Hotel, where shadows whisper secrets, and every corner hides untold horrors. This spine-chilling indie horror game takes you deep into a mysterious hotel filled with eerie atmospheres, enigmatic puzzles, and a story that unveils the dark bond of two brothers.

Key Features:

  • A Haunting Story: Dive into the enigmatic past of The Brothers Hotel, uncovering its haunting secrets while navigating through its foreboding halls.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Test your wits as you solve intricate puzzles to uncover the truth and escape the horrors that lurk within.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Experience a chilling environment brought to life with stunning visuals, atmospheric sound design, and a sense of dread that follows you at every turn.

  • Survival and Exploration: Carefully explore the hotel while evading dangers that want to keep the secrets of The Brothers Hotel buried forever.

  • A Twisted Bond: Discover the twisted history of the two brothers who once controlled the hotel and the curse that binds them to its walls.

Will you uncover the truth and escape the horrors of The Brothers Hotel, or will you become another lost soul in its haunted halls?

Prepare to face your fears and uncover the sinister story waiting for you.

Available Now!

Explore the mysteries of The Brothers Hotel today and immerse yourself in an unforgettable horror experience.
